initials.description: The initials that will be displayed if no image is set.\
initials.name: initials

imageUrl.description: A url for the image that will be displayed
imageUrl.name: imageUrl

name.description: A users name to be used for assistive technology
name.name: name

color.description:
The background and border color that represents the user. This should be
represented as a value that can be read by CSS
color.name: color

size.name: size

UNSAFE_className.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom class names for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_className.name: UNSAFE_className

UNSAFE_style.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom style for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_style.name: UNSAFE_style
